name: SHIRA
description:
Shira

It is an action game inspired by the old 8-bit computers, where the player assumes the role of the captain of a rescue ship, whose mission will be to save the scientific population living in the artificial satellite Shira, now converted into a powerful weapon that threatens peace in the galaxy after the invasion of an unknown life form.

The game

Shira mixes several gameplay concepts, where the player will have to control well the inertia and gravity of the ship, both to evade the different dangers and land safely to rescue as many allies as possible, all while shooting and defending against numerous enemies.

Contains two different endings and 21 missions with different challenges and enemies, including battles against boses.

Supports playing with keyboard or gamepad

Activate or deactivate CRT mode with scanlines with F2 key

Includes high resolution cover in the download.
